message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think you'd really find it valuable. I'm offering it to you for $160. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $80 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $140. I believe this product will be a great asset to you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $140. How about we meet at $110? I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.
